short_summary: Project Executive (Level 3) and Project Manager (Level 3) in Support of DMMS Renewal Contract
description: This requirement is for: The Department of National Defence...
duration_in_months: If the three options periods are exercised, the contract shall be valid for approximately 2.5 years
full_summary:
===============

**Tender Announcement: NPP - Project Executive (Level 3) and Project Manager (Level 3)**

**Reference Number:** cb-5098-41585433
**Solicitation Number:** W8482-231233/A
**Publication Date:** 2023-04-28
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-05-19T14:00:00

**Project Overview:**

The Department of National Defence is seeking contractors to provide Project Executive (Level 3) and Project Manager (Level 3) services in support of the DMMS Renewal Contract. The contract period will be for an initial two (2) year period with up to three (3) additional one (1) year option periods.

**Scope of Work:**

The successful contractor will be required to provide services in two areas, supporting both Fleet Data Management (FDM) and Non-Combatant (NC) Class desk. The contractor will be responsible for managing the project and providing technical expertise to ensure the successful completion of project objectives.

**Eligibility:**

This requirement is open only to those supply arrangement holders under EN578-170432/B. The following contractors have been invited to submit a proposal:

1. 2Keys Corporation
2. ADGA Group Consultants Inc.
3. Altis Human Resources (Ottawa) Inc., and Excel Human Resources Inc. in Joint Venture
4. Calian Ltd.
5. CGI Information Systems and Management Consultants Inc.
6. Computer Sciences Canada Inc. /Les sciences de l'informatique Canada Inc.
7. IFathom Corporation
8. IPSS Inc.
9. Michael Wager Consulting Inc.
10. Promaxis Systems Inc.
11. S.I. Systems ULC
12. Samson & Associès CPA/Consultation Inc
13. Sierra Systems Group Inc.
14. The Landsdowne Consulting Group Inc.
15. TRM Technologies Inc.

**Contact Information:**

For more information, please contact Amira Saleh at DMarP3BidSubmission-DOMar3Soumissiondesoffres@forces.gc.ca or (343) 551-7569.
